Why no blog updates for over a year http://localhost:1313/posts/2024-03-02-absence/ Thu, 04 Apr 2024 10:56:15 -0400doug@dougcuff.name (Doug Cuff) http://localhost:1313/posts/2024-03-02-absence/ =======
Why no blog updates for over a year https://blog.dougcuff.name/posts/2024-03-02-absence/ Thu, 04 Apr 2024 10:56:15 -0400doug@dougcuff.name (Doug Cuff) https://blog.dougcuff.name/posts/2024-03-02-absence/ >>>>>>> 12a98bb (Test commit) I haven’t been posting. Why? Because I ran into a technical issue that prevented me from connecting to GitHub. Weekend after weekend, I tried to solve it. I read post after post that claimed to have the fix. None of them helped. I have decent beginner’s technical skills, but I could not find a fix. Eventually, I accepted that I was going to have to uninstall (part of) a commercial piece of software.
Feeling appreciated <<<<<<< HEAD http://localhost:1313/posts/2022-09-27-unintended-use/ Tue, 27 Sep 2022 07:00:00 -0400doug@dougcuff.name (Doug Cuff) http://localhost:1313/posts/2022-09-27-unintended-use/ ======= https://blog.dougcuff.name/posts/2022-09-27-unintended-use/ Tue, 27 Sep 2022 07:00:00 -0400doug@dougcuff.name (Doug Cuff) https://blog.dougcuff.name/posts/2022-09-27-unintended-use/ >>>>>>> 12a98bb (Test commit) While walking through my local park, I ran into a former co-worker from 20 years back. I had been creating documentation; he had been supporting customers. He mentioned to me, 20 years later, how helpful my documentation had been for him. I do strive to write clearly for both users who need a quick refresher and those who are approaching the product for the first time, so I wasnâ€™t completely taken aback by his praise.
